title: Yolo89
author: Yolo89
created_time: January 23, 2023, 01:50:54 AMLast edit: January 23, 2023, 05:16:35 AM by Yolo89
content: Please is there anyone that can offer me a non collateral loan upto $220 usd I will pay $300 in 48 hours time.ThanksI know my account is new, but I have no issue verifying who I am. I simply need the loan to level up an account for a big, big bonus.Thanks in advance.

comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: There's no way to verify Bitcointalk account, anyone can create 100 alt accounts or giving fake KYC.

comments.author: Yolo89
comments.body: Quote from: Despairo on January 23, 2023, 02:35:40 AMThere's no way to verify Bitcointalk account, anyone can create 100 alt accounts or giving fake KYC.I understand totally! I don’t have any alts.I am willing to provide KYC and also do a live video chat KYC to prove who I really am.I am simply needing the loan to level up an account to get a large cash bonus. Can repay in 48 hours.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Edwardard on January 23, 2023, 04:49:35 AMWe had a chat in telegram and I confirm that I've accepted this loan request and sent 220usdt to above address.Txid: 0x60dccb54d0071e03ca7ca684dd525983b0c172702071aa2abad86ed3573a6ed5Please repay 0.017 BTC on or before 48hrs to:bc1qqsgsm8ahc2v5epc6al5vvstrmsj7yk0vkpa2k3A long time after I saw that a newbie received such a loan without collateral. I will be glad if you get your money back. A few years ago I gave one person about 5$ who has a negative trust but had a lot of erc tokens and s/he defaulted the loan. Wish you will get your money back at your desired time. But it is highly risky. Have good luck both of you. I will follow this link.

comments.author: Saint-loup
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on January 23, 2023, 05:46:34 AMQuote from: Edwardard on January 23, 2023, 04:49:35 AMWe had a chat in telegram and I confirm that I've accepted this loan request and sent 220usdt to above address.Txid: 0x60dccb54d0071e03ca7ca684dd525983b0c172702071aa2abad86ed3573a6ed5Please repay 0.017 BTC on or before 48hrs to:bc1qqsgsm8ahc2v5epc6al5vvstrmsj7yk0vkpa2k3A long time after I saw that a newbie received such a loan without collateral. I will be glad if you get your money back. A few years ago I gave one person about 5$ who has a negative trust but had a lot of erc tokens and s/he defaulted the loan. Wish you will get your money back at your desired time. But it is highly risky. Have good luck both of you. I will follow this link.BTC price is currently around $22 900. So 0.017 btc is worth $390. 390 / 220 = 1.77At the current prices that's a @1.77 bet of $220. If Edwardard thinks there are more chances than 1 / 1.77 = 56% to be paid, ie a little bit more than 1/2 chances, that could be a rather good opportunity. We'll see that in 2 days. Personally I'm little bit surprised that a VIP diamond 3 needs a loan for a such small amount. Anyway good luck to tem.
